briefdescription.para: Initialize the sensors. This function sets up the ADC channels for reading pressure and temperature sensors. It should be called before any sensor readings are performed.

simplesect.para: ESP_OK on success, or an error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Read sensor data. This function reads the current values from the pressure and temperature sensors. It populates the provided sensor_data_t structure with the latest readings.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a sensor_data_t structure where the sensor readings will be stored.

simplesect.para: ESP_OK on success, or an error code on failure.

The function assumes that sensors_init() has been called successfully before this function. It will read the ADC values, convert them to pressure and temperature, and store them in the provided structure.
